15.other: Pick one parameter or action, then click Add. You can quickly search through the parameters using the text field below.

22.other: Loading actions cache, please wait, this will be done only once...

23.other: Loading parameters cache, please wait, this will be done only once...

31.other: User unique Identifier. You cannot modify this value.

32.other: Specific profile. May imply some roles automatically applied.

42.other: Refine application parameters values and selectively disable plugin actions for this current role. Parameters here are global to the application (authentication, configuration, etc). See the Workspaces tabs for workspace-specific parameters/actions.

43.other: Grant access to workspaces for the current role/user/group

permissions.legend.user.other: Provide access to workspaces for the current user, overriding permissions inherited from user's roles. Use 'Manage Roles' to add/remove roles and identify the sources of inherited permissions.

permissions.legend.group.other: Provide access to workspaces for the current group. These permissions will be inherited by all users belonging this group.

permissions.legend.role.other: Provide access to workspaces for the current role. These permissions will be applied to all users to whom the role has been assigned.

45.other: Access to main application pages (like My Account, welcome page, etc.)

application-params.legend.other: Modify UX parameters and show/hide certain actions for a specific role, globally or by workspace.

application-params.legend.user-disclaime.other: As a general rule, this should be managed at role level, not user level!

52.other: Cells and public links created by this user

54.other: User informations and security actions. Hover fields in the form below to display explanations.

55.other: Toggle profile and roles to automatically grant permissions to this user.

workspace.statics.directory.description.other: Show address book full page (used by Mui3 Theme)
